00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * @package kata
00004  */
00005 
00006 /**
00007  * check if an array of parameters matches certain criterias.
00008  * you can still use the (deprecated) defines of model.php
00009  *
00010  * @package kata
00011  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00012  */
00013 class ValidateUtility {
00014 
00015              private $rules= array (
00016                           'VALID_NOT_EMPTY' => '/.+/',
00017                           'VALID_NUMBER' => '/^[0-9]+$/',
00018                           'VALID_EMAIL' => '/\\A(?:^([a-z0-9][a-z0-9_\\-\\.\\+]*)@([a-z0-9][a-z0-9\\.\\-]{0,63}\\.(com|org|net|biz|info|name|net|pro|aero|coop|museum|[a-z]{2,4}))$)\\z/i',
00019                           'VALID_YEAR' => '/^[12][0-9]{3}$/',
00020                           'VALID_IP' => '\b(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\b',
00021 
00022              );
00023 
00024              /**
00025               * checks the given values of the array match certain criterias
00026               * @param array $params key/value pair. key is the name of the key inside the $what-array, value is a "VALID_" define (see above) or simply the name of the define, the name of a function that is given the string (should return bool wether the string validates)
00027               * @param array $what the actual data
00028               */
00029              function check($params, $what) {
00030                           if (!is_array($params)) {
00031                                        return false;
00032                           }
00033                           foreach ($params as $param => $how) {
00034                                        if (!isset ($what[$param])) {
00035                                                     return $how;
00036                                        }
00037                                        if (function_exists($how)) {
00038                                                     if (!$how ($what[$param])) {
00039                                                                  return $how;
00040                                                     }
00041                                        } else {
00042                                                     if (isset ($this->rules[$how])) {
00043                                                                  if (!preg_match($this->rules[$how], $what[$param])) {
00044                                                                               return $how;
00045                                                                  }
00046                                                     } else {
00047                                                                  //regex per constant, gaaanz alt
00048                                                                  if (substr($how,0,1)=='/') {
00049                                                                               if (!preg_match($how, $what[$param])) {
00050                                                                                            return $this->getConstantName($how);
00051                                                                               }
00052                                                                               return true;
00053                                                                  }
00054                                                                  throw new Exception('validateUtil: Dont know how to do '.$how);
00055                                                     }
00056                                        }
00057                           }
00058                           return true;
00059              }
00060 
00061 /**
00062  * given the value of a constant find the name of the constant. needed for backwards compatibility, because validate() was in the model earlier
00063  * @param string $constValue value of the constant
00064  * @return string name of the constant
00065  */
00066              private function getConstantName($constValue) {
00067                           $all = &get_defined_constants();
00068                           foreach ($all as $name=>&$value) {
00069                                        if($value === $constValue) {
00070                                                     return $name;
00071                                        }
00072                           }
00073                           return false;
00074              }
00075 
00076 }
